mapper.select: SELECT p.pid, p.name, p.breed, p.age, p.gender, p.img_url, p.species, p.status, p.shelter_id, s.sid, s.name as shelterName, s.location as shelterAddress FROM pets p LEFT JOIN shelters s ON p.shelter_id = s.sid WHERE p.status = 'UNADOPTED' ORDER BY p.pid
